member.name: M:Discore.WebSocket.IDiscordGateway.UpdateStatusAsync(Discore.WebSocket.StatusOptions,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary:
Updates the status of the bot user.
Note: This method can only be called 5 times per minute and will wait if this is exceeded.
Note: This method will also throw an if the Gateway's shard is stopped while sending.
member.param: Options for the new status.
A token used to cancel the update.
member.exception: Thrown if the Gateway's shard has not been fully started.
Thrown if the Gateway's shard has been disposed.
Thrown if the cancellation token is cancelled or the Gateway's shard is stopped while sending.
member.remarks: This method will wait until the underlying Gateway connection is ready as well as retry if the connection closes unexpectedly until the given cancellation token is cancelled or the Gateway's shard is stopped.

member.name: M:Discore.WebSocket.IDiscordGateway.RequestGuildMembersAsync(Discore.Snowflake,System.String,System.Int32,System.Nullable{System.Threading.CancellationToken})
member.summary:
Requests guild members from the Discord API, this can be used to retrieve offline members in a guild that is considered "large". "Large" guilds will not automatically have the offline members available.
Members requested here will be available through the event.
Note: This method will also throw an if the Gateway's shard is stopped while sending.
member.param: The ID of the guild to retrieve members from.
Case-insensitive string that the username starts with, or an empty string to request all members.
Maximum number of members to retrieve or 0 to request all members matched.
A token used to cancel the request.
member.exception: Thrown if the Gateway's shard has not been fully started.
Thrown if the Gateway's shard has been disposed.
Thrown if the cancellation token is cancelled or the Gateway's shard is stopped while sending.
member.remarks: This method will wait until the underlying Gateway connection is ready as well as retry if the connection closes unexpectedly until the given cancellation token is cancelled or the Gateway's shard is stopped.

members.member: * REUSABILITY: * Any object inheriting this class CANNOT be reused. Once one connection attempt has * taken place, a new instance will need to be created to try again. * * This is due to the fact that System.Net.WebSockets.ClientWebSocket will never re-enter * the 'None' state, which is the only valid state for starting a connection. * * CANCELLATION TOKENS: * Cancelling any token passed to this class will ABORT the entire socket and cancel * all pending IO operations. *
